attributes.action: Council Cuts for Local/Community Football Facilities
attributes.additional_details:
Council Cuts in funding for the maintenance and up keep of Local Community Football pitches & Facilities.
Many sites across Bradford will not have Running Water/Showers or Changing facilities for the upcoming season 2013/14.Teams both effected or not feel very aggrieved at this decision as it contravenes League Rule 10b paragraph 3
(`Suitable washing & dressing accommodation must be provided by all clubs.)
This decision from Bradford council in their latest flurry of cutbacks has angered the community of Clubs registered with Bradford Sunday Alliance Fool-ball League.The overall fear is that clubs will not be able to continue with dwindling facilities across the Bradford District.Football & the Local footballing community has 100`s of volunteers who give there time for FREE along with a 30 year old league which works tirelessly to keep amateur football alive in Bradford.
Bradford Council Need To Re consider

rejection.details: Decisions to be made by Local Authority, not Gvt
